column3: *nervous* I'm so nervous. I'm not sure if this is sweat or if I unlocked some powerful water spell
The headmaster gave me the pep talk of a lifetime. Today I'm just gonna focus on doing better than yesterday.
Apparently you and I are facing each other today! I can't wait to see what you throw at me!
I'm feeling so fired up after our match yesterday! This wasn't so bad after all.
*sad* I barely lasted 5 minutes out there… I knew I'd choke if there were people here. Even Mr Domino came. God I'm so embarrassed…
*joyful* Well, I still lost, but I had a lot of fun. I feel like I'm starting to get how swapping works.
*joyful* I had a great time sparring with you. I learn so much from you guys. It's crazy how clearly I can see your thoughts when we're sparring.
*joyful* I wish you could've seen my spar against Marco! I almost had him. He even admitted he was nervous the whole second half of our match!
Alright _, it's finally our turn. Don't go easy on me!
I can't believe it! You'd better not have been going easy on me!
Ahhhh man! I thought I had you!
Wait--w-why would we do that? I don't want random people from the island to come watch me spar.
I wonder if we'll have some time to practice after the festival. I want to use the training fields to work on my spellcasting.
